com.google.appinventor.client.editor

Class EditorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.editor.EditorManager

  • public final class EditorManager
extends Object
    Manager class for opened project editors.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EditorManager()
      Creates the editor manager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EditorManager

        public EditorManager()
        Creates the editor manager.

    • Method Detail

      • openProject

        public ProjectEditor openProject(ProjectRootNode projectRootNode)
        Opens the project editor for the given project. If there is an editor already open for the project, it will be returned. Otherwise, it will create an appropriate editor for the project.
        Parameters:
        projectRootNode - the root node of the project to open
        Returns:
        project editor for the given project

      • getOpenProjectEditor

        public ProjectEditor getOpenProjectEditor(long projectId)
        Gets the open project editor of the given project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectId - the project ID
        Returns:
        the ProjectEditor of the specified project, or null

      • closeFileEditors

        public void closeFileEditors(long projectId,
                    String[] fileIds)
        Closes the file editors for the specified files, without saving. This is used when the files are about to be deleted.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        fileIds - file IDs of the file editors to be closed

      • closeProjectEditor

        public void closeProjectEditor(long projectId)
        Closes the project editor for a particular project, without saving. Does not actually remove the editor from the ViewerBox. This is used when the project is about to be deleted.
        Parameters:
        projectId - ID of project whose editor is to be closed

      • scheduleAutoSave

        public void scheduleAutoSave(ProjectSettings projectSettings)
        Schedules auto-save of the given project settings. This method can be called often, as the user is modifying project settings.
        Parameters:
        projectSettings - the project settings for which to schedule auto-save

      • scheduleAutoSave

        public void scheduleAutoSave(FileEditor fileEditor)
        Schedules auto-save of the given file editor. This method can be called often, as the user is modifying a file.
        Parameters:
        fileEditor - the file editor for which to schedule auto-save

      • saveDirtyEditors

        public void saveDirtyEditors(Command afterSaving)
        Saves all modified files and project settings and calls the afterSaving command after they have all been saved successfully. If any errors occur while saving, the afterSaving command will not be executed. If nothing needs to be saved, the afterSavingFiles command is called immediately, not asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        afterSaving - optional command to be executed after project settings and file editors are saved successfully

      • generateYailForBlocksEditors

        public void generateYailForBlocksEditors(Command successCommand,
                                Command failureCommand)
        For each block editor (screen) in the current project, generate and save yail code for the blocks.
        Parameters:
        successCommand - optional command to be executed if yail generation and saving succeeds.
        failureCommand - optional command to be executed if yail generation and saving fails.
